explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly compares several machine learning methods for trajectory prediction.

explanations.neural network: Deep learning methods typically involve neural networks.
explanations.sequence-to-sequence learning: Trajectory prediction can be framed as a sequence-to-sequence learning problem.

explanations.encoder-decoder: Encoder-decoder architectures are commonly used in sequence-to-sequence learning.
explanations.recurrent neural network: RNNs are often used for sequence data like trajectories.
explanations.long short-term memory: LSTMs are a type of RNN suitable for sequence prediction tasks.
